Sentencas: A notched bimaterial bar bend test was applied to identify weak interfaces that influence the thermomechanical performance of solid-oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stacks with planar design.
Titulo: Determination of the interfacial fracture energies of cathodes and glass ceramic sealants in a planar solid-oxide fuel cell design

Sentencas: The experiments were focused on the weakest interface of the multilayered cells and on the rigid glass ceramic sealants between metallic interconnects of SQFC stacks.
Titulo: Determination of the interfacial fracture energies of cathodes and glass ceramic sealants in a planar solid-oxide fuel cell design

Sentencas: The fracture energies of these interfaces were determined.
Titulo: Determination of the interfacial fracture energies of cathodes and glass ceramic sealants in a planar solid-oxide fuel cell design

Sentencas: To test interfaces within the cells, they were glued to steel strips, and the notched cell was Used as a stiffener in the test.
Titulo: Determination of the interfacial fracture energies of cathodes and glass ceramic sealants in a planar solid-oxide fuel cell design

Sentencas: The Weakest part of the cells with composite cathodes was the interface between the functional part of the cathode and the remaining current collector.
Titulo: Determination of the interfacial fracture energies of cathodes and glass ceramic sealants in a planar solid-oxide fuel cell design

Sentencas: Values for the interfacial fracture energies of composite cathodes both freshly prepared and after aging were determined.
Titulo: Determination of the interfacial fracture energies of cathodes and glass ceramic sealants in a planar solid-oxide fuel cell design

Sentencas: Taking advantage of the crack extension within the anode from the notch-tip to the interface, the fracture energy of the oxidized and reduced anodes was calculated.
Titulo: Determination of the interfacial fracture energies of cathodes and glass ceramic sealants in a planar solid-oxide fuel cell design

Sentencas: Sandwich specimens with glass ceramic between the interconnect steel were used to determine the fracture energies for different glass ceramic-steel interfaces.
Titulo: Determination of the interfacial fracture energies of cathodes and glass ceramic sealants in a planar solid-oxide fuel cell design

Sentencas: Different combinations of ferritic steel and glass ceramic were tested.
Titulo: Determination of the interfacial fracture energies of cathodes and glass ceramic sealants in a planar solid-oxide fuel cell design

Sentencas: The fracture path developed partly along the interface and partly in the glass ceramic, which did not influence the fracture energy.
Titulo: Determination of the interfacial fracture energies of cathodes and glass ceramic sealants in a planar solid-oxide fuel cell design

Sentencas: However, a significant improvement of the fracture energy with annealing time was found.
Titulo: Determination of the interfacial fracture energies of cathodes and glass ceramic sealants in a planar solid-oxide fuel cell design
